snippet.title: Arcade Game: Major Havoc (1983 Atari) [Re-Uploaded]
snippet.description:
A Shooting 'em up game. You are Major Havoc, leader of a brave band of clones. All from one, one from all, fighting for humanity...
Eons ago the evil Vaxxian Empire overran the galaxy Most of your ancestors were enslaved and taken to the Vaxxian homeworld. Only a few scientists escaped. The small band of scientists cloned you, Major Havoc, to fly your Catastrofighter through a wormhole in space, leading your clone army against the dreaded Vaxxian robots to free your people by destroying the enemy reactor

Played and recorded with MAME 0.174.

Note: Used invincibility cheat after down to last life. Also used infinite oxygen and reactor time cheat in some levels. 

Note: Previously Uploaded. Re-Uploaded for better quality.
